column4: which packages should I install to get the latest kernel? (64bit)
you don't need any extra package, last available kernel is installed by default
you do not need to install anything
last available kernel is allways installed
and what would be the command so the kernel packages will be made for that kernel?
you need no command for that
well. before I had. otherwise it would not work
if in doubt just run sudo apt-get install linux-image-2.6.32-21-generic
